message: Hello Bob, thank you for considering my product! I'm excited to discuss the details with you. After careful consideration, I'm willing to offer you the product for $800,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value it will bring to your business.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, $800,000 is a bit too low for me.  I'm willing to pay $950,000, which is a fair price considering the product's value to me. I believe this offer is reasonable and allows for a mutually beneficial agreement.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm not comfortable accepting $950,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product for $900,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value it will bring to your business, and I'm confident you'll find it a worthwhile investment.
